description: Rikolto, a Belgian NGO, focuses on transforming sustainable food systems through collective action, emphasizing collaboration with various stakeholders, including local governments, academia, and producer organizations; to promote healthy, nutritious, and affordable diets for all, particularly focusing on women, youth, and migrants. By building alliances with local governments, academia, and community organizations, Rikolto seeks to transform food systems through initiatives like youth entrepreneurship and circular food economies, ensuring sustainable access to food while addressing local challenges.
name: Rikolto
